name: Battle City: Infinite
description:
The old classic tank game that everyone loves, now upgraded with the modern unreal engine. I've made this game on the foundations of the battle city but I tried to give a new perspective to the game's mechanics.

Features:

  • Infinite Levels
  • New power-ups along with the old ones
  • New strategic bird placement system. Now you're not at the hands of the level, you pick the best spot to protect the bird
  • Realistic breakable environment
  • 4 different enemy types with unique attacks
  • Local score and high score system

Sadly, I couldn't use the original sounds. But I think having realistic arcade sounds creates an interesting atmosphere

How to play

-WASD or Arrow keys to move

-Z or Left Mouse Click to shoot

-X to call the bird (You can only call the bird forward)
